data.title: Brief on behalf the legal guardians to the heirs of Antonio Pujol versus Enrique and Juan Canas, concerning certain inheritance rights in the estate of the spouses Jacobo Pablo and Leonor Segrer. [Ca.
data.meta_description: Title devised, in English, by Library staff. Jurisdiction covered: Spain. Also available in digital form on the Library of Congress Web site. Also available on microfilm (Law Library Microfilm 84/10004). Document in Latin.
data.text:
